header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.conv_type: discussing, explaining, inquiring, complaining, advising, anecdote telling, making arrangements

body.u: I erm have pretty much decided that I'm not gonna to drive to work any more
any more any more
any more any more
okay

erm my car isn't reliable in the slightest and I'm just not enjoying it at all like aside from the like the congestion traffic et cetera et cetera like obviously with it getting darker now for the whole hour I'm driving home I'm just I'm squinting and I'm starting in like into headlights and it's just not very nice and I I get to work in the morning and I'm exhausted because I've had to concentrate so hard for the last hour just to get myself to work I'm exhausted by the time I start and when I get home I'm exhausted because I've done a whole day's work and then I've had to drive home for an hour so I'm getting home and it's it's not even seven o'clock and I'm absolutely shattered whereas like even though the train is a little bit more of a faff but when I get to work on on the mornings I get the train even though I've left probably for work about forty minutes earlier than I would be car I'm actuall I've got more energy by the time I get to work and then
yeah
coming home like I've got plenty of energy when I get home to do stuff
okay if that's what you wanna do that's what you'll do
and the way I see it like that
you need if you need to take the car you can take it

well the way I see is that like erm this way I'm getting incidental exercise so I don't have to feel so bad about like not getting to the gym and stuff erm but er that kind of brings me to my car I wanna get rid
okay

I don't see the point of holding onto it obviously I've said I wanna take you out in it tonight to listen to it you know when you just I know it's about to cost me more money? it is about to cost me more money I was I was kind of surprised that they were even willing to offer me like six or seven hundred quid for it because it's done so many miles and it's so old and it is battered but I'm surprised it's even worth that at the moment my concern is actually if I let it get to a state where it needs more work again not only is it gonna cost me money but actually the value of the car isn't gonna warrant me paying it if the car's worth six hundred quid now I don't wanna keep spending two or three hundred pound at a time to fix it cos that's jus ridiculous
it's not actually

I'm never gonna get that money back erm which brings me onto something we were talking about yesterday in that erm I wondered whether you perhaps would like to buy a new car using my car as part exchange and then sell your car and just pocket the money because you said to me basically yesterday that getting cars on finance it that would be the money you would put into savings for if you wanted to go away with your friends et cetera et cetera well if you if you use the money that you got for your car and put it into a savings account
so I just straight sell my car now basically?

I mean it's just an idea I'm not saying that that's I'm not saying I'm not you're not I'm just kind of putting it out there as a suggestion that we could use my car as part exchange and actually get a little bit of money off and then whatever you make on your car you can just keep as savings for you to do whatever you want with
okay let me try and work this out right we use both cars as a deposit for one car
well we could do that
yeah
if you wanted
well yeah
but that means you'd have no cash though so it would kind almost defy the
yeah maybe
the point of it
yeah or maybe sell my car and then use some of that as deposit
yeah well what I was th
I might see about if my parents want a new car
well what was th
combine those off them

what I was thinking is what you might be able to do is you know that fifteen hundred pounds you've got that's kind of stashed aside at the moment? you could use that plus my car as a deposit and then put that money back in there when you sell your car do you know what I mean? so you'd have like you'd have over two grand as a deposit which means hopefully that would bring your monthly repayments down like a little bit
and then I sell my car as soon as possible
and then you sell your car as soon as possible
about to obviously pay for my MOT aren't I?
yeah but I actually see that as a positive cos if
what freshly MOT'd?

yeah it's but it's a selling point saying you know it's not gonna need a service or MOT for another year like that's a really big selling point erm and you know like you probably will actually get more for your car with it being serviced and MOT'd cos people kind of trust it a little bit more so I don't see it as a bad thing that it's about to go in for service and MOT
if it passes
yeah

erm but yeah annoyingly there's a little bit of a been a little bit of a ticker on it because my tax is due at the end of this month and the tax is like ninety quid for six months which isn't the be all and end all but it's something to bear in mind erm
I'll talk to I'll s I'll talk to my parents and see what they advise

well I haven't done any sums or anything this is just like me thinking off the top of my head I need to get rid of my car put it that way I'd quite like the seven hundred quid however that comes do you know what mean? is this okay with bruises or not? can we watch a film tonight?
